entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
